titleStmt.title: The institution of a Christen man conteynynge the exposytion or interpretation of the commune Crede, of the seuen Sacramentes, of the .x. commandementes, and of the Pater noster, and the Aue Maria, iustyfication [and] purgatory.
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: In aedibus Thomae Bertheleti regii impresoris,

notesStmt.note: This edition has main text set in textura type (20 lines = 95mm.).
Copy at reel 2023, misbound. Bound with and filmed following STC 10033.4 (Articles devised by the kynges highnes majestie ...).
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 31) and University College Library (Oxford, England) (reel 2023).
